title: League Of Legends download not working!?
body:
every time i clikc download this pops up ! The server at l3cdn.riotgames.com can't be found, because the DNS lookup failed. DNS is the network service that translates a website's name to its Internet address. This error is most often caused by having no connection to the Internet or a misconfigured network. It can also be caused by an unresponsive DNS server or a firewall preventing Google Chrome from accessing the network.
Go to http://riotgames.com/
Search on Google

l3cdn riot games Shell Installer EUNE League Legends 2014
 ! so pls help me now, i need help right awey thank you i need help from riot games or from any one ho has had this problem

replies.body:
Hey there MacedonianHacker,

I am able to download the linked file with no issues, however it seems you are experiencing an issue resolving the linked domain.

Can you follow the steps outlined in [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) guide to change to a public DNS server. (In this case, Google DNS)

Please let me know if this resolves your issue.
